target: 你好, 世世世界界界!

source: This is a test of the translation system.
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
target: 敏捷的棕色狐狸跳過懶惰的狗狗。

source: Software development is a complex and rewarding field.
target: 軟體開發是一個複雜且有回報的領域。

source: To be, or not to be, that is the question.
target: 生存還是毀滅，這是個問題。

source: The financial markets are experiencing significant volatility this week.
target: 本週金融市場正經歷顯著波動。

source: Please ensure all safety protocols are followed strictly.
target: 請確保所有安全協議嚴格遵守。

source: Artificial intelligence is transforming many industries.
target: 人工智慧正在改變許多產業。

source: What is the weather forecast for tomorrow?
target: 明天的天氣預報是什麼？

source: The new product launch has been a resounding success.
target: 新產品發布取得了圓滿成功。

source: Check out our website at https://www.example.com for more information.
target: 請查看我們的網站 https://www.example.com 以獲取更多資訊。

source: My email is john.doe@email.com, feel free to contact me.

The price is $99.99, but there is a 20% discount!
The score was 4-3 in an exciting match.
